title: Alcohol Potentiates Salvia div ?
report: I bought 10g high quality 5X extract. I had never done salvia before. I used up three whole grams with no effects at all, even though I knew the stuff was good since it sent everybody else into outer-space.

Then I tried it after having three small beers (approx. 1 liter 4% beer in total), and I finally broke on through. Used exactly the same amount, method etc. as before. People might try a little alcohol if they have trouble getting any effect from Salvia.

erowid.citation: Anonymous. "Alcohol Potentiates Salvia div ?: experience with Salvia divinorum (5x extract) & Alcohol (Beer) (ID 14787)". Erowid.org. May 19, 2002. erowid.org/exp/14787
